1462750.name: Soldier
1462750.description:
2-4 player online battle
Control of up to 4 member one guy is monster and last 3 guy is soldier U can drink poison drink and change to monster

Battle Mode
Battle monster vs soldier until which whole team side dead

More map mode mode
Experience a whole new dimension of fear each time a map is released for Soldier.

How to play
  • Soldier Team
First you should take item and you can equip two different item
  • monster
You need to kill whole soldier
  • if the time goes end both team is draw

What are the recommended items
Developer recommended items is move slow Granada that is definitely cool!!

英语*
